targets.expr: sum by (reason)(prts_passback{timeinterval="$timeInterval"} * ON(instance, name) GROUP_LEFT(environment) app_pod_info{environment="$environment"})
sum by (reason)(prts_fast_passback{timeinterval="$timeInterval"} * ON(instance, name) GROUP_LEFT(environment) app_pod_info{environment="$environment"})
sum by (type)(prts_deserialization_error{timeinterval="$timeInterval"} * ON(instance, name) GROUP_LEFT(environment) app_pod_info{environment="$environment"})
sum by(endpoint)(rts_dynamic_passback_percent{timeinterval="$timeInterval", endpoint!="application"} * ON(instance, name) GROUP_LEFT(environment) app_pod_info{environment="$environment"})
